message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm aiming for a price around $18,000.  What are your thoughts?
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm really interested in the product, and I'm willing to go up to $12,500.  Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate you countering.  I can definitely come down a bit, but $12,500 is pretty far from what I'm looking for. Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $15,500?
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $15,500 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $13,500.  This is my final offer, and if it doesn't work, I'll have to go with John.
